document_data.name: ''Carpet of Diving''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Carpets of diving''''' were cursed [[magic item]]s that originated in [[Zakhara]], the Land of Fate.
document_data.Description: A ''carpet of diving'' measured {{SI|5|ft|long=yes}} wide by {{SI|7|ft|long=yes}} long and could carry three people.
document_data.Powers: These carpets behaved just like other ''[[Carpet of flying|carpets of flying]]'', assuming they never flew higher than {{SI|200|ft|long=yes}} above the ground. At an altitude of 200 ft. or higher, the carpet stalled and then dove straight for the ground. Any riders unable to fly or slow their descent by other means usually died upon impact with the ground.
